Portal 2 is a very fun puzzle game, and breaks the traditional puzzle game fashion. It has some of the most unique mechanics in any video game and an engaging, funny story to go with it. It will take you about ten hours to complete which is in my opinion a good length for a puzzle game. If you need a good mental workout without doing any maths, go pick this one up!

RATES - 8.5/10

Продолжение популярной серии игр Portal в своей красе, в данном случае вас ожидает куча новых головоломок и вспомогательных средств для перемещения и установки порталов, а так же появилась возможность играть с напарниками, что гораздо упрощает задачу переместиться в другую комнату испытаний лаборатории Aperture.
Рекомендую после прохождения первой части Portal.
Сначала думаешь, что ты заперт с дэбилом в одной комнате, а потом понимаешь, что их два
bardzo mi się podoba, fabuła jest fajna. Język polski jest u mnie zbugowany

好玩！自己玩了很久前段时间终于约到了联机的朋友于是把联机的部分打完了hhhh得到感受：一定要和聪明的人一起玩啊哈哈哈哈哈！游戏体验感极好！全程听胖哥：“在这里打个，在那里打个，好的我们走！”然后就通关了！哈哈哈哈哈哈偶尔我也能反应比他快，然后就听他瞎吹hhh笑死了，整个流程欢乐无比。虽然但是我单人关卡卡关了！果然没人一起玩就没动力打！我，菜鸡本人了hhhh反正买就是了，这么经典的游戏，不会还有人没玩过吧不会吧不会吧不会吧（阴阳怪气.jpg）
很好玩啊，流程太短了不够玩啊（大哭）

Excellent game that still holds up well even after a few years. Went back to it recently, and while the puzzles might not be the difficult masterpieces nostalgia told me they were, they'll still give you a good challenge in some of the later levels in terms of thinking up a solution and occasionally just being able to execute it.

Multiplayer is as good a time as always, especially if one or both of you hasn't had a chance to do the coop puzzles before. For those who haven't played it, you get two sets of portals between the two of you, so a couple of the puzzles can get really complex and fun as you try to figure out which portals need to stay open and which ones can be set up elsewhere for the team.

And of course, can't talk about Portal without noting the brilliant writing and voice performances by the cast across the board. 

If you somehow have never played this game, you owe it to yourself to at least grab it the next time you have a few bucks lying around or a sale hits. You won't be disappointed.
See Glados was right! Wheatly is truly an all around idiot

Every once in a while, there comes a different game.
A game that doesn't set new standards, but simply gives us a new experience in such a manner, it easily becomes one of the most popular games of all times.

Portal is one of those games.
I've finished them both and I don't even need to write a long and detailed review about these games.
Such a great game.

[b]Pros[/b]
+ Amazing level design. Valve is truly god-tier (Portal and Half-life series are the best!)
+ Rewarding to play. Feels so good when beating a level/chapter
+ Fun to play
+ Soundtrack
+ Graphics are amazing! 
+ Voice acting 
+ Great conclusion to the series

[b]Score:[/b] 9/10
